name: Slime Asylum
description:
A game made for the Ludum Dare 49 game jam

WARNING: Web version takes a while to load each scene, so if you are using it, be patient.

The Year is 2121 You worked at the slime asylum, a facility for mentally unstable slimes. It was a normal day until they escaped.  It is up to you to save everyone from the slime army  BE WARNED, When these slimes escaped, one attacked you, and the world started to feel a little UNSTABLE
